mapper.select: select borrowid, userid, lendtime, borrows.bookid, status, bookname, booktype from borrows, books where borrows.userid = #{userid} and books.bookid = borrows.bookid
select borrowid, userid, lendtime, borrows.bookid, status, bookname, booktype from borrows, books where borrows.bookid = #{bookid} and borrows.bookid = books.bookid
select borrowid, userid, lendtime, borrows.bookid, status, bookname, booktype from borrows, books where borrows.status = #{status} and books.bookid = borrows.bookid
select * from user, (select userid from (select userid, booktype from books, borrows where books.bookid = borrows.bookid) as ub where ub.booktype = #{booktype}) as uid where user.userid = uid.userid
